mapper.insert: insert into servers (Server_name, Host, Db, Username, Password, Port, Socket, Wrapper, Owner) values (#{server_name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{host,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{db,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{socket,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wrapper,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update servers set Host = #{host,jdbcType=CHAR}, Db = #{db,jdbcType=CHAR}, Username = #{username,jdbcType=CHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, Port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Socket = #{socket,jdbcType=CHAR}, Wrapper = #{wrapper,jdbcType=CHAR}, Owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR} where Server_name = #{server_name,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select Server_name, Host, Db, Username, Password, Port, Socket, Wrapper, Owner from servers
